abstract: John-Patrick Smith beats defending champion Ivo Karlovic in first round of Delray Beach Open.
snippet: Third-seeded Ivo Karlovic, the defending champion, lost to the qualifier John-Patrick Smith, 6-3, 3-6, 6-2, in the first round of the Delray Beach Open in Florida.
lead_paragraph: Third-seeded Ivo Karlovic, the defending champion, lost to the qualifier John-Patrick Smith, 6-3, 3-6, 6-2, in the first round of the Delray Beach Open in Florida.
